sub_title: Head of Studies Social Sciences at Amsterdam University College
summary:
I first encountered the liberal arts ideal as a student in Poland, then I moved to do research on the visions of the first leaders who (re)introduced liberal arts across Europe, and then I ran the educational processes of a liberal arts institution in Siberia. I now joined AUC to think with the team of social sciences what next for the liberal arts - in Europe and beyond. 

I care about honest people, real challenges, and bold institutions.

Revamped quality assurance at SAS through language testing, updating admissions criteria, revising course evaluations, expanding the academic integrity policy at the School, Academic Writing Center and appeals process.
